segments.text: Let's see . I had the salmon starter which was £ 5.90 and my Pizza was £ 8.25 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I had the soup and bruschetta which all together is £ 4.50 and my trout for the main course was £ 12 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So that's £ 14.15 for me and £ 16.50 for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes and shall we go fifty-fifty for the wine ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , so that's an extra £ 6 for both of us .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So now your bill comes to £ 20.15 and I need to pay £ 22.50 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And I had a dessert - that's another £ 3.50 . And you had coffee which is £ 2 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , this is everything on the list .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So now my bill is £ 24.50 and yours come to £ 23.65 . Is that correct ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , that's exactly it . How much tip shall we give the waiter ?
segments.speaker: S1
